name: Artisan Olive Oil
description: Premium cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil from Mediterranean groves. Rich taste with fruity undertones.

name: Specialty Coffee Beans
description: Single-origin gourmet coffee beans, medium roast with notes of chocolate and berries. Ethically sourced.

name: Gourmet Chocolate Box
description: Assorted handcrafted chocolates with unique flavors including sea salt caramel, raspberry, and hazelnut praline.

name: Aged Balsamic Vinegar
description: 12-year aged balsamic vinegar from Modena, Italy. Perfect for salads, marinades, or drizzling over cheese.

name: Craft Beer Selection
description: Six-pack of award-winning craft beers including IPA, stout, and wheat beer from small independent breweries.

name: Artisanal Cheese Set
description: Selection of four premium cheeses including aged cheddar, blue cheese, goat cheese, and brie with crackers.
